Hello All,

I wrote an original novel which is what I'd call "historical" 
=
fanfic. 
Fujita Gorou plays a key supporting role in it however he is in no=
 
way similar to portrayals we have seen in the past (anime/manga/live 
act=
ion movies)  he is just simply my "take" on him.  Yes it will 
also depict =
the Fujita family and explain some stuff.

The story is mainly about the Me=
iji Era however there will be scene 
which take place during the Bakumatsu.=


The rating for this story is NC-17 due to the portrayals of various 
form=
s of sexuality. Please, only people over 17-18 should read it.  
I don't wa=
nt to traumatize the youngins.  I am building a website 
for this story and=
 for the general public to acquire the story 
they'd have to paypal some am=
ount of money (which basically means if 
they are old enough to have a cred=
it card or checking account---they 
can read my story).  It was not profess=
ionally edited, and ofcourse 
I'm not a professional writer.  It will not b=
e published or anything 
so you will notice that each chapter has a differe=
nt theme and 
nearly a different tone to it.  That's because this novel is =
sort of 
an experiment.

I'm a nerd.

So there will be footnotes in the sto=
ry (^_^)

It is OVER 70,000 words long.

http://1happyturtle.com/SilapaJaru=
n/ONOSUZUE.pdf

if the story was even mildly entertaining to you, please co=
nsider 
sending me money (^_^) 

members of SHQ have generously donated mon=
ey for the upgrade of the 
website, which is now in its final phase (basica=
lly 2 weeks to go) 
and aside from teh initial donations, I've been paying =
for stuff out 
of my own pocket.  I know the website hasn't "changed" or be=
en 
updated in months, but that is because updates would drive the 
program=
mer insane due to the database format we are implementing. 
Once everything=
 is done then updates will resume immediately.

ntained in the story ($1, $1.50---I don't
